title: Rogue's Sultry Women (The Rogue's Harem Book 1): A Fantasy Erotic Novel
description: A dashing rogue and his nubile harem find adventure!  Sven, a daring swashbuckler and adventure, throws himself into danger. With Kora, a naughty priestess, he finds more than he bargains after raiding the cruel servants of a sinister naga.  Liberating the nubile and naughty Zanyia, Sven finds the keys to bring down his enemy.  Prince Meinard ambition burns hot. He wants to unite his country beneath his iron fist. His desire burns for Princess Ava. The sultry princess has given her heart to another. To be with the man she loves, she has to defeat the power-hungry tyrant.  Sven, Kora, and Zanyia have a new mission. They will bring down Prince Meinard. With his growing harem of beautiful and naughty women, the rogue will end Prince Meinard's cruel reign.  You have to read this hot, erotic adventure!  The rogue gathers his harem of naughty priestesses, hot warrior-women, wicked faeries, and more beauties to defeat Prince Meinard!  This full-length erotic novel contains: exhibitionism, voyeurism, menage, oral, anal, A2M, creampie, BDSM, domination, submission, bondage, monsters, faerie, supernatural, elves, futa-on-female, first time, lesbian, and more!  This hot novel is not for the faint of heart!
author: Reed James
